snippet.title: The Rogue of Nexus | Release Date Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Darkness is chasing you -- literally. In The Rogue of Nexus you won't just have to fight monsters, but escape from a colossal and ever-present Hand determined to drag you into the abyss.

Inspired by the frenetic pace of Half-Minute Hero and the addictive replayability of The Binding of Isaac, The Rogue of Nexus throws you into procedurally generated dungeons filled with loot, traps and hordes of bizarre creatures. Every step counts. Can you overcome destiny and escape the Hand's grasp?

Wishlist The Rogue of Nexus on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/3417340/The_Rogue_of_Nexus/
